title: Simplify Development Task UI
description: Remove unnecessary UI elements (Branch, PR created and ready for development, Rebase links) from the Development Task interface to create a cleaner, more focused user experience.
iWant: a simplified Development Task interface without cluttered UI elements
soThat: I can focus on essential development actions without visual distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development text is removed
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Essential development task information remains visible and accessible
UI maintains consistent styling after element removal
